title: Part D

descriptions:
The response does not accurately include either of the criteria below.

  • Draws a correctly labeled graph of the loanable funds market.

  • Shows an increase in the demand for loanable funds (or a decrease in the supply of loanable funds), resulting in an increase in the equilibrium real interest rate.

  • Draws a correctly labeled graph of the loanable funds market.

  • Shows an increase in the demand for loanable funds (or a decrease in the supply of loanable funds), resulting in an increase in the equilibrium real interest rate.

  • Shows an increase in the demand for loanable funds (or a decrease in the supply of loanable funds), resulting in an increase in the equilibrium real interest rate.

title: Part E
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not accurately include either of the criteria below.

  • States that the price of previously issued bonds will decrease.

  • States that the rate of economic growth in the long run will decrease and explains that an increase in the real interest rate means the cost of borrowing has increased, which will decrease investment spending on physical capital, human capital, and/or research and development.
